errorMessage.title: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The system message if there was an error/issue. Follow the instructions and provide an error response to the user that doesn't contain PII.

purchasableProducts.title: purchasableProducts
purchasableProducts.description: A list of product records that have been verified to be purchasable by the current store. Display these in a table list with Display Name, Product Type (Family) and a link to view the product ('https://00dfl000003pbbrea4-78590c2f.storeconnect.app/products/[s_c__Slug__c]').

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId of the current store the user is interactive/purchasing from.
